story.book.view

Class StoryFragmentListActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • story.book.view.StoryFragmentListActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestingActivity, StoryView

    public class StoryFragmentListActivity
extends Activity
implements StoryView, RequestingActivity
    StoryFragmentListActivity displays all story fragments contained in the story that is currently open. Selecting a story fragment will allow user to: 1. Edit the story fragment 2. Set the story fragment as the starting fragment 3. Delete the story fragment from the story
    Author:
    Jessica Surya, Vina Nguyen

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void changeFragmentTitle()
      changeFragmentTitle() adds a new fragment to the current story.
      private void doMySearch(java.lang.String query)
      doMySearch() takes a query from the search bar, passes it to StoryCreationController, and display the set of results returned by the controller in the listView
      private void editFragment(int FID)
      editFragment() passes the FragmentID from the selected story fragment in the list and starts a new StoryFragmentEditActivity for edit the contents of the fragment
      private void getFragmentTitles()
      getFragmentTitles() loads fragment titles from the story using the StoryCreationController and displays them in the list by calling updateFragmentList() method

      • editFragment

        private void editFragment(int FID)
        editFragment() passes the FragmentID from the selected story fragment in the list and starts a new StoryFragmentEditActivity for edit the contents of the fragment
        Parameters:
        FragmentID - (FID) which will be passed to StoryFragmentEditActivity
